description: This file defines a React functional component called NoteEditor, which provides a user interface for editing, creating, and deleting notes. It manages local state for note title and content, handles form submission, and renders input fields with styling.

methods.name: NoteEditor
methods.description: React functional component for editing or creating notes with save and delete functionalities.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles the save operation, validating inputs and invoking the onSave callback.
